function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 can persist on fomite surfaces for 3-7 days in indoor environments, leading to potential transmission of the virus.","Impact":"Increased risk of fomite transmission and indoor contagion.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of fomites and surfaces, promoting hand hygiene and providing adequate ventilation.","Technologies":"Filtration systems, UVGI systems for air purification.","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, especially in crowded and poorly ventilated spaces.","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Close-contact aerosol transmission of SARS-CoV-2 is likely in confined, crowded, and poorly ventilated indoor environments, increasing the risk of contagion.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of aerosol transmission leading to increased infection rates.","Mitigation":"Ensuring adequate ventilation, implementing mask-wearing, and controlling the number of individuals in a room.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, masks for aerosol reduction.","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, particularly in crowded and poorly ventilated spaces.","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inadequate preventive measures in indoor environments can lead to exposure to the virus through close contact, respiratory droplets, and fomite transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus exposure and transmission in indoor environments.","Mitigation":"Disinfection of fomites and surfaces, hand hygiene, uncrowded spacing, and mask-wearing.","Technologies":"Disinfection methods, hand hygiene products, spatial planning for uncrowded spacing.","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, particularly in crowded and poorly ventilated spaces.","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities."}]}
